VALIDATION_NATIONAL_ID_REQUIRED: natinalId is required in header params field.
VALIDATION_FIRST_NAME_REQUIRED: firstName is required in header params field.
VALIDATION_LAST_NAME_REQUIRED: lastName is required in header params field.
VALIDATION_NO_STATE_CODE_IN_HEADER: no state code is defined in the header.
CLAIM_POLYGON_NOT_FOUND_IN_STATES_CMS: claimed polygon is not contained in any CMS.
CLAIM_POLYGON_HAS_OVERLAP_WITH_DOCUMENTE: claimed polygon has overlap with documented parcel.
